articles.title: NASA to Discuss Webb's Arrival at Final Destination, Next Steps - NASA
articles.description: Scientists and engineers operating NASA’s James Webb Space Telescope will answer questions about the mission’s latest milestones in a NASA Science Live broadcast at 3 p.m. EST Monday, Jan. 24, followed by a media teleconference at 4 p.m.
